channel.title: Lost-Haven | A Long-Term RSPS Experience : Launched November 12th, 2015
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=7]Lost-Haven[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]You can claim your bonus by using the code "Rune-Server" upon logging in![/SIZE]
Play Now: [url=http://"http://lost-haven.com/forums/index.php?/topic/2-play/"]Begin your adventure![/url] Hiscores: [url=http://"http://lost-haven.com/hiscores/"]The best of the best![/url] Forums: [url=http://"http://lost-haven.com/forums/"]Lost-Haven Community[/url]
[URL=http://"http://lost-haven.com/forums/index.php?/topic/10-experience-rates/"]Click here for experience rate details[/URL]
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Information[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=3]At Lost-Haven our goal is to provide you with a server that you are able to play for weeks, if not months, without running out of objectives to complete. This means that there are slow experience rates, coins are incredibly valuable, and the game is very competitive. We have done this to ensure that you will always be intrigued by the game play, and also so that new players will be able to join the competitive action at any time. All of our updates are hand picked and chosen by the players. The worst that could happen is you do not enjoy it, so at least try it out![/SIZE]
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[ul][*]Active Playerbase | Growing Quickly [*]Dedicated Development Team [*]Fully integrated website template [*]100% Functioning Ironman & Ultimate Ironman ranks [*]Secure & Stable Client [*]100+ Achievements [*]Flawless Clan Chat [*]Stable Economy | Made to last [*]1-2 Updates Each Week [*]20+ Bosses : Godwars, Dagannoths, Tormented Demons, KBD, Chaos Elemental, Slash Bash, Nomad, KQ, Phoenix, Bandos Avatar, Glacors, Corporeal Beast, Nex, Jungle Demon, Barrelchest [*]10+ Minigames : Warriors Guild, Pest Control, Duel Arena, Barrows, Fight Cave, Fight Pits, Graveyard Arena [*]Password encryption : Double hashed and salted [*]Customizable Client : Gameframe, Cursors, Tooltips, Absorption, Hitsplats, Smilies, Textures, Input saving, Censor, FOG, Resizable, Fullscreen [*]Duo Slayer [*]Almost all items must be obtained organically/from other players who have obtained them - Shops are very limited! [*]Double experience weekends, as well as double experience events [*]Random server events [*]Quick Prayers[/ul]
[CENTER][SIZE=6]Media[/SIZE][/CENTER] [CENTER] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/f7419c9648f7a490a0244a2145c8b283.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/95e6450c6670b48b0e9bbf038150953e.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/061d0a40655130e5f59f276a509b4bb2.png[/img]
[IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/b28beb5e41bfbe96c913875a857dc513.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=3]More media and information will be added over the course of the next week. We would have delayed posting this until then, however we would love for players to come online and suggest what they want changed or modified.[/SIZE][/CENTER]
We thank [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/swiffy/"]Swiffy[/URL] for the release of [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/606076-ruse-release-grand-exchange-ironman-modes-extremely-stable-anti-ctf-wpe.html"]Ruse[/URL], without which this would not have been a possibility. We understand there are a lot of servers using his release, however we are likely the only server with more than a few days of gameplay and frequent, quality updates.
We thank [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/dynamic/"]Dynamic[/URL] for his talent with web development and all the work that he was able to do with our website in a short period of time. You can also inquire about his services [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/black-market/virtual-items/selling/603856-120-examples-dynamics-services-website-design-website-development-graphics.html"]here[/URL].

item.title: Lost-Haven | A Long-Term RSPS Experience : Launched November 12th, 2015
item.dc:creator: @LiveVyre LiveVyre
item.description:
@LiveVyre wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=7]Lost-Haven[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=4]You can claim your bonus by using the code “Rune-Server” upon logging in![/SIZE]

Play Now: Begin your adventure!
Hiscores: The best of the best!
Forums: Lost-Haven Community

Click here for experience rate details

[CENTER][SIZE=6]Information[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[SIZE=3]At Lost-Haven our goal is to provide you with a server that you are able to play for weeks, if not months, without running out of objectives to complete. This means that there are slow experience rates, coins are incredibly valuable, and the game is very competitive. We have done this to ensure that you will always be intrigued by the game play, and also so that new players will be able to join the competitive action at any time. All of our updates are hand picked and chosen by the players. The worst that could happen is you do not enjoy it, so at least try it out![/SIZE]

[CENTER][SIZE=6]Features[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[ul][]Active Playerbase | Growing Quickly
[]Dedicated Development Team
[]Fully integrated website template
[]100% Functioning Ironman & Ultimate Ironman ranks
[]Secure & Stable Client
[]100+ Achievements
[]Flawless Clan Chat
[]Stable Economy | Made to last
[]1-2 Updates Each Week
[]20+ Bosses : Godwars, Dagannoths, Tormented Demons, KBD, Chaos Elemental, Slash Bash, Nomad, KQ, Phoenix, Bandos Avatar, Glacors, Corporeal Beast, Nex, Jungle Demon, Barrelchest
[]10+ Minigames : Warriors Guild, Pest Control, Duel Arena, Barrows, Fight Cave, Fight Pits, Graveyard Arena
[]Password encryption : Double hashed and salted
[]Customizable Client : Gameframe, Cursors, Tooltips, Absorption, Hitsplats, Smilies, Textures, Input saving, Censor, FOG, Resizable, Fullscreen
[]Duo Slayer
[]Almost all items must be obtained organically/from other players who have obtained them - Shops are very limited!
[]Double experience weekends, as well as double experience events
[]Random server events
[]Quick Prayers[/ul]

[CENTER][SIZE=6]Media[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER]

f7419c9648f7a490a0244a2145c8b283.png766×529

[/CENTER]

[CENTER][SIZE=3]More media and information will be added over the course of the next week. We would have delayed posting this until then, however we would love for players to come online and suggest what they want changed or modified.[/SIZE][/CENTER]

We thank Swiffy for the release of Ruse, without which this would not have been a possibility. We understand there are a lot of servers using his release, however we are likely the only server with more than a few days of gameplay and frequent, quality updates.

We thank Dynamic for his talent with web development and all the work that he was able to do with our website in a short period of time. You can also inquire about his services here.

Read full topic
item.source: Lost-Haven | A Long-Term RSPS Experience : Launched November 12th, 2015
